abstract: Commerce Dept reports factory orders for long-lasting manufactured goods dropped 2.8 percent in February, evidence that manufacturing companies still face significant pressure.
lead_paragraph: Orders for durable goods fell 2.8 percent in February, after a 4.2 percent increase in January, the Commerce Department said Thursday.

headline.main: Durable Goods Orders Dropped 2.8% in February
headline.print_headline: Orders for Durable Goods Dropped 2.8% in February

snippet: Orders for durable goods fell 2.8 percent in February, after a 4.2 percent increase in January, the Commerce Department said Thursday.
